TopicTitle: very wobbly sas...also warp only works via keyboard

Articles.Content:
really dont feel this is a mod problem...but then what do i know...s.a.s doesnt hold true when fireing engines, and in space steering is all over the place..is there a button i have pressed or some combi key thingy...also small thing but warp doesnt work with mouse on the green arrow thingy, only via keyboard

any help please

thanx

sam
